definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: I was continually getting up and going to the bathroom to refill my glass.
sentences.chinese: 我频繁起来去洗手间，把我的玻璃杯灌满水。

sentences.english: She needs to ask for the squad leader’s permission when she wants to go to the washroom.
sentences.chinese: 就连去洗手间，她都需要事先征得班长的同意。

sentences.english: Go into the other genda's bathroom without fear of being caught.
sentences.chinese: 进入异性的洗手间，再也不用担惊受怕了。

sentences.english: Unique seascape toilet attaching to the main bedroom elucidates individual life space.
sentences.chinese: 独有全海景主卧洗手间，张扬个性生活空间。

sentences.english: The Permit Holder shall provide portable toilet for the on- site construction workforce.
sentences.chinese: 许可证持有人须为驻工地建筑工人提供流动洗手间。

sentences.english: The lights in the ladies' toilets are crystal extravaganzas.
sentences.chinese: 女洗手间里的灯光闪着水晶的光芒。

sentences.english: Because people always sit in the closestools in washrooms .
sentences.chinese: 因为在洗手间里人们坐在马桶上。

sentences.english: They laughed and banged at the door.
sentences.chinese: 他们哈哈大笑地锤打洗手间的门。

sentences.english: Legend has it that there is a bar in New York where, in the ladies' room there is a very special mirror.
sentences.chinese: 相传纽约一个酒吧的女洗手间里一块魔镜。

sentences.english: They are not convenient when you have to use the restroom.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢吊带裤，要去上洗手间时很不方便。

sentences.english: Patient:Well, I've got a terrible stomach-ache and I keep needing the toilet.
sentences.chinese: 我的肚子痛得非常厉害，而且我总要频繁去洗手间。

sentences.english: Jack shook him awake, and Arete immediately demanded to go to the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 杰克摇醒阿雷特，他立即要求上洗手间。

sentences.english: They lived upstairs in spotless quarters, although the bathroom was in the backyard.
sentences.chinese: 虽然洗手间在院子里，他们的卧室可是一尘不染。

sentences.english: We found gloves lying in the toilet. Why here?
sentences.chinese: 我们在洗手间中发现地上有手套。为什么会在这？

sentences.english: I stroked his hair and headed to the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 我抚摸他的头发，之后向洗手间走去。

sentences.english: The restroom is just over there, beside the crosswalk.
sentences.chinese: 洗手间就在那儿，在人行横道边上。
